xmlkeyword.term: EiffelEnvision, New Projects, Windows Eiffel Application

paragraph.paragraph: The Windows Eiffel Application Wizard creates a new simple Windows Eiffel Library (WEL) ../../structure/index.xmlProject. The project will be added to an active or new Visual Studio .NET vxconVisualStudioSolutionsProjects 0 Solution .
The wizard is separated into two pages. Overview and System Settings. You may switch between the pages by clicking on the name of the page, located in the wizard's left pane.

The Overview page presents a basic overview of what is going to be generated for the project. The information detailed on this page reflects the information set of the System Settings page. If the defaults do not meet with your requirements, then please use the System Settings page to make the necessary changes.

The System Settings page allows you to modify the settings for the system created when the wizard is completed. The page only permits the selection of the type of window to create, when creating the project. There are Frame-based windows and Dialog windows:

Generate a Frame-base System
Selecting this option will cause the wizard to generate a frame based application. This uses a main window or "frame", which can have menus, sub windows etc.

Generate a Dialog-base System
Selecting this option will cause the wizard to generate a dialog based application. This uses a sequence of dialogs for the application.

Once you have set the appropriate settings for the new project, clicking Finish will create a new EiffelEnvision ../../structure/index.xmlProject with the specified settings. Upon completion the following classes will be generated:
ROOT_CLASS: The root class of the system which inherits WEL_APPLICATION. There is a single feature, main_window, which returns the main window of the system (class MAIN_WINDOW) which will be displayed when the application is launched.
MAIN_WINDOW: The main window of the system.
APPLICATION_IDS: Contains application constants.
An application _core_Working_with_Resource_Files 0 Resource Script , containing various UI parameters, will also be generated and added to the project.
